paragraphs.body: Eiding began his career over thirty years ago. He was a singer, bass player, and director in the 3rd Infantry Division's Marne Glee Club in Germany. Later, while creating and performing comedy sketches at the Brave New Workshop in Minneapolis, Eiding also contributed as an actor and writer to National Public Radio's All Things Considered, supplying topical material. He has directed stage shows in Ohio, Wisconsin, Minnesota, and California, and has also written and directed several short films and videos. A husband of twenty-eight years, he is the father of two daughters.
